data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in high up the field for Genoa in Udine.
In the minute 2, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
Samir (Udinese) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the home team a throw-in.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a throw-in for Udinese, close to Genoa's area.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ignacio Pussetto for Udinese who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 18, Udinese’s Ignacio Pussetto is on his feet again at Stadio Friuli.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Ignacio Pussetto (Udinese) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 19, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Genoa a goal kick.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Genoa throw-in in Udinese's half.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Genoa.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Genoa just outside Udinese's area.
Genoa's Mattia Bani attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 22, Udinese have a goal kick.
Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Udinese's half?
Free kick Genoa.
In the minute 24, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Genoa drive upfield and Milan Badelj gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Udinese defender.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
In the minute 26, Genoa have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Udinese in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 30, In Udine a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Andrea Masiello (Genoa) gets a yellow card.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio Friuli.
In Udine Udinese attack through Rodrigo De Paul. The finish is off target, however.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Rodrigo De Paul is on target to give Udinese a 1-0 advantage.
Roberto Pereyra instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Udinese.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Rodrigo De Paul.
In the minute 38, Rodrigo De Paul is back on his feet again.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 40, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Udinese.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Free kick Genoa.
In the minute 44, Genoa have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
Genoa advance rapidly upfield but Gianpaolo Calvarese blows for offside.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Udine.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Udinese.
Edoardo Goldaniga is on a sub for Davide Biraschi for Genoa.
In the minute 46, Gianpaolo Calvarese waits before resuming play because Davide Biraschi for Genoa is still down.
Goal kick for Udinese at Stadio Friuli.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Udinese throw-in in Genoa's half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Genoa at Stadio Friuli.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 54, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Genoa to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 59, Genoa are coming forward and Luca Pellegrini gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Udinese have a goal kick.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Udinese are in shooting range from this free kick.
At Stadio Friuli, Milan Badelj has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 64, Udinese's Rodrigo De Paul gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Genoa defender.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Genoa.
Tolgay Arslan for Udinese has been booked by Gianpaolo Calvarese and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 65, Udinese to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Throw-in Udinese.
Important block from the Udinese defence as Goran Pandev fires in a strike for Genoa.
In the minute 67, Bram Nuytinck is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Udinese make their first substitution with Rolando Mandragora replacing Tolgay Arslan.
The home team have replaced Ignacio Pussetto with Kevin Lasagna. This is the second substitution made today by Luca Gotti.
In the minute 68, Miha Zajc is replacing Stefano Sturaro for the away team.
The away team replace Goran Pandev with Eldor Shomurodov.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Udinese a goal kick.
In Udine a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 72, Udinese's Bram Nuytinck looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Can Genoa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Udinese's half?
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Ball safe as Udinese is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Udinese's Juan Musso has been booked in Udine.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 79, Rolando Mandragora for Udinese drives towards goal at Stadio Friuli. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Genoa are pushing forward but Luca Pellegrini's finish is wide of the goal.
Udinese have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Udinese.
Vittorio Parigini is replacing Luca Pellegrini for Genoa at Stadio Friuli.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Genoa close to the penalty box.
Genoa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Udinese.
Rodrigo De Paul (Udinese) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio Friuli.
Paolo Ghiglione (Genoa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goal kick for Udinese at Stadio Friuli.
In the minute 87, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Genoa throw-in in Udinese's half.
Genoa push forward at Stadio Friuli and Milan Badelj gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Udinese defence.
In Udine, Rodrigo De Paul of Udinese is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Udinese.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rolando Maran is making the team's fifth substitution at Stadio Friuli with Mattia Destro replacing Andrea Masiello.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Udinese.
Genoa push forward at Stadio Friuli and Miha Zajc gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Udinese defence.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Udinese in the half of Genoa.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Genoa's Miha Zajc gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Udinese defender.
Mattia Bani of Genoa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Udine Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca is caught offside.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Udinese.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Udinese make their third substitution with Jean-Victor Makengo replacing Roberto Pereyra.
Gianluca Scamacca is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Mattia Bani.
Gianluca Scamacca (Genoa) has received a first yellow card.
Mattia Perin (Genoa) is red-carded and dismissed.
